scripts.push:client: cd react-pizza_v2 && git add . && git commit -m "Frontend changes" && git push origin Client
scripts.push:server: cd pizza-backend-node && git add . && git commit -m "Backend changes" && git push origin Server
scripts.push:all: npm run push:client && npm run push:server
scripts.install:all: npm run install:client && npm run install:server
scripts.branch:all: npm run branch:client && npm run branch:server
scripts.commit:client: cd react-pizza_v2 && git add . && git commit -m
scripts.commit:server: cd pizza-backend-node && git add . && git commit -m
scripts.commit:all: npm run commit:client -- "" && npm run commit:server -- ""
